name: The Perfect Balance
description:
Controls: Left mouse button to spawn a block.
Goal: Try to stack as many blocks as you can, on the opposite sides of the balance scale. If more blocks fall than those left on the scale, it's game over.
Jam: Made for trijam 68.9 in 3 hours.
Credits: Asset pack: kenney. Sorry, didn't have time to add music or sfx.

Please share your high score and leave feedback. Thanks for playing!
